title: S5 Ep15: Forced displacement, then and now
itunes:title: Forced displacement, then and now
description: Syria, Venezuela, Ukraine: forced migration is constantly in the news, but these events have been happening for hundreds of years. Sascha Becker tells Tim Phillips about new research that is discovering the economic impact of mass displacement in history, both on refugees and on communities â€“ and the lessons we can learn from the past.
